name: ImaginationLearning
0:
”Alexa, open imagination learning”
”Let's play”
”Let's go to the forest”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: imagination learning
des:
Imagination learning from Imagunet creates several stories around many different scenarios with characters generated upon decisions provided by each kid.
Each story is personalized and each children receives recognition with every challenge passed.
Each character shares compelling facts about the world and challenges kids with all kinds of questions about related topics.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
